news.title: The Kooks to bring Inside In/Inside Out 20th anniversary tour to Trinity Summer Series
news.summary: They will perform in Trinity College Dublin on July 5.

news.title: Neil Young and The Chrome Hearts announce Cork gig
news.summary: The concert will include special guests Elvis Costello and The Imposters.

news.title: Album Review: Ispíní na hÉireann, Poxtail Soup
On this day in 1988: My Bloody Valentine released their debut studio album Isn't Anything
news.summary: On November 21, 1988, My Bloody Valentine released their groundbreaking debut album, Isn't Anything, via Creation Records. To mark the album's anniversary – and ahead of the band’s eagerly anticipated 3Arena show this weekend – we're revisiting a classic interview…

news.title: Remembering Mani: Revisit a classic Hot Press interview with The Stone Roses and Primal Scream bassist
news.summary: As tributes continue to pour in for Mani, following the sad news of his death yesterday, aged 63, we're revisiting a classic interview with the legendary bassist...

news.title: Album Review: David Keenan, Modern Mythologies
news.summary: Superb fourth album from Dundalk star. 9/10
